util

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BankServer, StoreServer

    public abstract class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Server is an abstract class that encapsulates Catalyst context and network behaviour. Server is immutable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        protected Server(java.lang.String name)
        Handles server setup. Network connections and thread context startup.

        Assumes only it and an the default object store exist on the network and updates from there.

        The serializable classes and handle registration must be done post-construction, before exports or imports.

        All server classes assume they will talk to a naming service through RegisterRequest and RegisterReply which are registered in the serializer by default.

        Parameters:
        name - The name through which to register the server in the naming service.

        Should be descriptive of function and will be bagged with other servers registering under the same name.

    • Method Detail

      • getSerializer

      • getOwnAddress

        protected io.atomix.catalyst.transport.Address getOwnAddress()

      • tryPort

        private void tryPort()
        Try to get a random user port.

        User ports are in range 1024-(48127+1024).

        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if 3 sucessive failures

      • setup

        protected void setup()
        Use this method to kickstart server enviroment.

        Specify actual underlying server implementation in the execute() method to get called after initial server setup;

        setup() will attempt to register serializables (registerSerializables()), open a random user port through tryPort() and finally attempting to register handlers (handlers(Connection)).

        May except due to port failure tryPort()

      • execute

        protected abstract void execute()
        Execute the server is up to the underlying implementation of the server.

        Execution must follow the setup() method.

      • handlers

        protected abstract void handlers(io.atomix.catalyst.transport.Connection c)
        Register all handlers to listen as server.
        Parameters:
        c - The open Transport.server() connection.

      • registerSerializables

        protected abstract void registerSerializables()
        Register all expected serializable classes specific to the underlying server implementation in the thread-context's serializer.
